item.title: Beogram 4000: Installation of a Neutrik Gold Plated DIN5 Plug
item.description:
A common improvement for the Beogram 4000 is replacing the DIN5 plug with a gold-plated version. The older plugs, often corroded, benefit from the upgrade. This particular Beogram 4000 was no exception. Here’s a comparison of the old plug and the new, gleaming Neutrik plug (Newark 27B4483): The old plug was removed, and the cable was prepped for the new plug. Stripping the outer insulation to this length works well:..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4000-installation-of-a-neutrik-gold-plated-din5-plug/
